item.description: Looking for an entertaining event to attend for a meet-up, pertaining to your French interest? We invite Voulez Vous Francais to join us for Beaujolais Nouveau at 75 Chestnut, our beautiful neighborhood restaurant in Beacon Hill, on Thursday, November 17th. Visit our website, 75chestnut.com and you’ll find out more about our Beaujolais Nouveau celebration, where we’ll also serve French inspired specials alongside our full menu. If you’d like to make a reservation for your group, please give us a call at 617-227-2175; we’d be happy to accommodate you and would love to have your Francophone members join us for a delectable dinner!
item.name: Celebrate Beaujolais Nouveau
